com.facebook.litho.testing.subcomponents

Class SubComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.litho.testing.subcomponents.SubComponent

  • public class SubComponent
extends Object
    Allows convenient type matching comparison for instances of Components. Useful for verifying the existence of sub-components that are part of a layout.

    • Method Summary

      • legacySubComponent

        public static <any> legacySubComponent(SubComponent subComponent)
        Use an old-style SubComponent in an assertj Condition.

        For instance: 

        
   assertThat(c, mComponent)
    .has(
        subComponentWith(
            c,
            legacySubComponent(
                SubComponent.of(
                    FooterComponent.create(c).text("Rockstar Developer").build()))));
        Parameters:
        subComponent - The constructed of(Component).
        Returns:
        A condition to be used with org.assertj.core.api.Assertions#assertThat
